song_name: Only Thing I Ever Get For Christmas
lyrics:
10 contributorsonly thing i ever get for christmas lyricschorus
if youre the only thing i ever get for christmas
then everything i wished for has come true
youre the single line up on my list youre my one and only christmas wish
the mistletoe is where ill be waiting meet me there

verse 1
i know someone out there knows what im saying oh no
baby youre a girl whos wishing just like me yeah yeah
there is one and you know who you are my gift to you is all my heart
make my holiday and hear me when i say

chorus
if youre the only thing i ever get for christmas
then everything i wished for has come true
youre the single line up on my list youre my one and only christmas wish
the mistletoe is where ill be waiting meet me there

verse 2
in the morning i know everybodys rushing
to see whats underneath the christmas tree
know what i mean cause i dont find it there underneath the mistletoe is where
you make my holidays so hear me when i say yeah

chorus
if youre the only thing i ever get for christmas
then everything i wished for has come true
youre the single line up on my list youre my one and only christmas wish
the mistletoe is where ill be waiting meet me there
you might also likebridge
only you can make this a merry merry christmas yeah
there is one and you know who you are
my gift to you is all my heart
make my holiday and hear me when i say

chorus
if youre the only thing i ever get for christmas
then everything i wished for has come true
youre the single iline up on my list youre my one and only christmas wish
the mistletoe is where ill be waiting meet me there

outro
all i ever wanted was you this christmas
yeah yeah yeah i need you baby
youre the single iline up on my list youre my one and only christmas wish
the mistletoe is where ill be waiting kiss me there ill be waiting kiss me there1embed
